name: Filament Jetstream
description: An enhanced Laravel starter kit built with Filament, inspired by Jetstream with complete team management features. Includes auth, registration, 2FA, session management, API tokens, and comprehensive team support.

author.name: Momin Al Zaraa
author.bio: Full-stack developer and Laravel enthusiast specializing in building scalable web applications and developer tools.

features: Complete team management features (add, remove, update roles)
Proper invitation flow (register to accept, not auto-registration)
Publishable Action classes with contracts (Jetstream pattern)
Publishable language files with locale-first structure
Enhanced email templates matching Jetstream's UI
Custom validation rules (Role rule matching Jetstream)
Better data handling aligned with Jetstream's mature patterns
Custom translation loader with automatic merging
